trans-unit.source: Meal data from the Health database is used to determine glucose effects. Glucose data from the Health database is used for graphing and momentum calculation. Sleep data from the Health database is used to optimize delivery of Apple Watch complication updates during the time you are awake.

trans-unit.source: Meal data from the Health database is used to determine glucose effects. Glucose data from the Health database is used for graphing and momentum calculation. Sleep data from the Health database is used to improve the Apple Watch complication.
trans-unit.target: Terveys-sovelluksen ateriatietoja käytetään glukoosivaikutusten määrittämiseen. Terveys-sovelluksen glukoositietoja käytetään graafeissa ja laskelmissa. Unitietoja käytetään Apple Watch -komplikaation toiminnan optimointiin hereillä olon aikana.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Health Share Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Carbohydrate meal data entered in the app and on the watch is stored in the Health database. Glucose data retrieved from the CGM is stored securely in HealthKit.
trans-unit.target: Sovelluksen ja kellon kautta tallennetut hiilihydraattitiedot tallennetaan Terveys-sovellukseen. Glukoosiseurannan kautta saadut glukoositiedot tallennetaan turvallisesti HealthKitiin.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Health Update Usage Description

trans-unit.id: %1$@ is unable to communicate with your insulin pump. The app will continue trying to reach your pump, but insulin delivery information cannot be updated and no automation can continue. You can wait several minutes to see if the issue resolves or tap the button below to learn more about other options.

trans-unit.source: Future glucose is predicted by combining the effects of multiple inputs. Use this tool to toggle various inputs to see how they compare to the final prediction.
trans-unit.target: Tulevia glukoosiarvoja ennustetaan yhdistämällä useiden eri tekijöiden vaikutuksia. Tämän työkalun avulla voit havainnoida, kuinka ne vaikuttavat lopulliseen ennusteeseen laittamalla niitä päälle/pois.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Future glucose is predicted by combining the effects of multiple inputs. Use this tool to toggle various inputs to see how they compare to the final prediction."; ObjectID = "D4C-I2-dhA";

trans-unit.source: Observed changes in glucose, subtracting changes modeled from insulin delivery, can be used to estimate carbohydrate absorption.
trans-unit.target: Havaittua glukoosin muutosta, josta on vähennetty insuliinin mallinnettu vaikutus, voidaan käyttää hiilihydraattien imeytymisen arviointiin.
